TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {77826=Wallace's 41-yard catch and run highlighted a 10-play, 71-yard march that Mendenhall capped with a one-yard run with 6:57 left in the opening quarter., 78536=Pittsburgh held the ball for the first 7:42 of the third and scored on a trick play near the goal line.
